verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> as touching <S%G4012><s%> <S%G99999><s%> the ministering <S%G1248><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%>, it is <S%G2076><s%> superfluous <S%G4053><s%> for me <S%G3427><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>:

For <S%G1063><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> the readiness <S%G4288><s%> of your mind <S%G5216><s%>, for which <S%G3739><s%> I boasted <S%G2744><s%> of <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> to them of Macedonia <S%G3110><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> Achaia <S%G882><s%> was ready <S%G3903><s%> <S%G99999><s%> a year ago <S%G4070><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> zeal <S%G2205><s%> has provoked <S%G2042><s%> very many <S%G4119><s%>.

Yet <S%G1161><s%> have I sent <S%G3992><s%> the brothers <S%G80><s%>, lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G99999><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> boasting <S%G2745><s%> of <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> should be in vain <S%G2758><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> behalf <S%G3313><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> I said <S%G3004><s%>, you may <S%G3903><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> ready <S%G3903><s%>:

Lest perhaps <S%G3381><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they of Macedonia <S%G3110><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> unprepared <S%G532><s%>, we <S%G2249><s%> (that <S%G2443><s%> we say <S%G3004><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, you <S%G5210><s%>) should be ashamed <S%G2617><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this same <S%G3778><s%> confident <S%G5287><s%> boasting <S%G2746><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> I thought it <S%G2233><s%> necessary <S%G316><s%> to exhort <S%G3870><s%> the brothers <S%G80><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they would go before <S%G4281><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> make up beforehand <S%G4294><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> bounty <S%G2129><s%>, whereof you had notice before <S%G4293><s%>, that the same <S%G3778><s%> might be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G99999><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> a matter of bounty <S%G2129><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> of covetousness <S%G4124><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> I say <S%G3588><s%>, He which sows <S%G4687><s%> sparingly <S%G5340><s%> shall reap <S%G2325><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> sparingly <S%G5340><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> which sows <S%G4687><s%> <S%G99999><s%> bountifully <S%G2129><s%> shall reap <S%G2325><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> bountifully <S%G2129><s%>.

Every man <S%G1538><s%> according as <S%G2531><s%> he purposes <S%G4255><s%> in his heart <S%G2588><s%>, so let him give <S%G3361><s%>; not <S%G1537><s%> grudgingly <S%G3077><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> necessity <S%G318><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> a cheerful <S%G2431><s%> giver <S%G1395><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1415><s%> to make all <S%G3956><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> abound <S%G4052><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> you <S%G3842><s%>, always having <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> sufficiency <S%G841><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G4052><s%>, may abound to <S%G1519><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%>:

(As <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, He has dispersed abroad <S%G4650><s%>; he has given <S%G1325><s%> to the poor <S%G3993><s%>: his <S%G846><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> remains <S%G3306><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> ministers <S%G2023><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> to the sower <S%G4687><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> ministers <S%G5524><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> your food <S%G1035><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> multiplies <S%G4129><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> seed sown <S%G4703><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> increases <S%G837><s%> the fruits <S%G1081><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>;)

Being enriched <S%G4148><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every thing <S%G3956><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> bountifulness <S%G572><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> causes <S%G2716><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> the administration <S%G1248><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> service <S%G3009><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> supplies <S%G4322><s%> the wants <S%G5303><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> abundant <S%G4052><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> thanksgivings <S%G2169><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>;

While <S%G1223><s%> by the proof <S%G1382><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> ministration <S%G1248><s%> they glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> professed <S%G3671><s%> subjection <S%G5292><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for your noble <S%G572><s%> distribution <S%G2842><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> all men <S%G3956><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> by their <S%G846><s%> prayer <S%G1162><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, which yearn for <S%G1971><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the exceeding <S%G5235><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>.
Thanks <S%G5485><s%> be unto <S%G1909><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> unspeakable <S%G411><s%> gift <S%G1431><s%>.
